permissions: Admins can create prediction agents; non-admins can create if they have membership on the prediction subject.
side_effects: Creates a prediction agent record; after creation it enqueues analysis generation and may create or update an associated prediction.
validation_notes: --prediction-subject is required. Prediction subjects must have at least two submitted predictions by different users. Only one active prediction agent is allowed per prediction subject.

flags.name: --custom-instructions
flags.description: Custom instructions to guide the agent
